meanings.definition: To insert into a sentence as a parenthesis.
meanings.sent1: She parenthesizes additional information in her writing.
meanings.sent2: He always parenthesizes explanations for clarity.
meanings.sent3: The teacher parenthesizes jokes in his lectures to keep students engaged.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness parenthesizes every interaction she has.
meanings.sent5: The artist parenthesizes vibrant colors in her paintings to create contrast.

meanings.sent1: The mathematician parenthesizes numbers in equations for organization.
meanings.sent2: Please parenthesizes the list of items before sending it out.
meanings.sent3: The chef parenthesizes secret ingredients in her recipes to surprise her guests.
meanings.sent4: His love for music parenthesizes his entire life.
meanings.sent5: The garden parenthesizes a variety of flowers in full bloom during springtime.
